mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_interface_info_apply_record ( interface_info_apply_id, process_node, process_node_id, audit_result, audit_opinion, audit_user_id, create_user_id, update_user_id ) VALUES ( #{interfaceInfoApplyId}, #{processNode}, #{processNodeId}, #{auditResult}, #{auditOpinion}, #{auditUserId}, #{createUserId}, #{createUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, interface_info_apply_id, process_node, process_node_id, audit_result, audit_user_id, (select user_name from user where id = audit_user_id) as auditUserName, (select user_name from user where id = create_user_id) as createUserName, create_user_id, update_user_id, create_time, update_time FROM t_interface_info_apply_record WHERE interface_info_apply_id = #{interfaceInfoApplyId} and deleted_flag = '0'

select count(*) from t_interface_info_apply where deleted_flag = '0' and process_instance_id in
#{item}
and audit_status in ('0', '1')
and create_user_id in (select id from user where user_name like concat('%',#{createUserName},'%') and deleted_flag = '0')

SELECT id, process_instance_id AS processInstanceId, name, description, url, request_params AS requestParams, request_header AS requestHeader, response_header AS responseHeader, method, code_json AS codeJson, audit_status AS auditStatus, create_user_id AS createUserId, update_user_id AS updateUserId, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_interface_info_apply WHERE deleted_flag = '0' and process_instance_id in
#{item}
and audit_status in ('0', '1')
and create_user_id in (select id from user where user_name like concat('%',#{createUserName},'%') and deleted_flag = '0')
limit #{currentPage}, #{pageSize} ORDER BY create_time DESC
